section.name: Deploying the Hippo ECM wars

subsection.name: Application Server
subsection.p: Start and configure your Application Server.

section.subsection: No special settings are needed for the default wars. For a list of configuration options see: [TODO] link.

Upload the wars to your application server in the following order:
hippo-ecm-repository.war
hippo-ecm-cms.war
Now you can browse to the following urls:
http://[host]:[port]/hippo-ecm-repository/
http://[host]:[port]/hippo-ecm-cms/
Replace the [host] and [port] values to match you Applicaiton Server installation.
